thread.title: New characters from Shenmue, Street Fighter and more join Project X Zone 2 - Gaming
thread.title_full: New characters from Shenmue, Street Fighter and more join Project X Zone 2 - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Albaraa Fahmy
title: New characters from Shenmue, Street Fighter and more join Project X Zone 2 - Gaming
text: The cast of playable characters in Project X Zone 2 is continuing to expand with even more variety.Among the latest additions include Shenmue's Ryo Hazuki, Street Fighter's M Bison and Ingrid, as well as Tales of Vesperia's Estellise.Ryo Hazuki from @SEGA_Europe's Shenmue series joins #ProjectXZone2! pic.twitter.com/v9ufetZjmnâ€” Bandai Namco UK (@BandaiNamcoUK) October 9, 2015They will be joined by other newcomers such as Pyron from Darkstalkers, Black Hayato from Star Gladiator, Ranmaru Mori from Sakura Wars, T-Elos from Xenosaga and Metal Face from Xenoblade Chronicles.And that's not all - Bandai Namco plans to continue sharing more reveals over the next few weeks leading up to the crossover title's release.The publisher recently announced the roster additions of Chrom and Lucina from Fire Emblem Awakening and Fiora from Xenoblade Chronicles.Other featured titles in Project X Zone 2 include popular series such as Resident Evil, Mega Man, Devil May Cry, Yakuza, Shinobi, SoulCalibur, Tekken and more.Developed by Nintendo subsidiary Monolith Soft, Project X Zone 2 will be available for Nintendo 3DS on February 19, 2016.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
